## Exercise 1

Simulating 100 trajectories of length $n = 1000$ for $X$ and $Y$.

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
Traj_X = c()
Traj_Y = c()
X = c(0)
Y = c(0)
for (k in 1:100) {
    for (i in 1:1000) {
        if (i > 1) {
            X = c(X, 0.5*X[i-1]+rnorm(1))
            Y = c(Y, 2*Y[i-1]+rnorm(1))
        }
    }
    Traj_X = c(Traj_X, X)
    Traj_Y = c(Traj_Y, Y)
}
```
